name: Angry Norwegian Woman: The Choppening!
description:
A shipwrecked viking raider seeks revenge and plunder on a society of red-headed enemies.  Chop. Collect gold. Chop some more!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am a sociologist, but that's kind of boring.  So I decided to start teaching myself how to make games.... thus, "Angry Norwegian Woman: The Choppening!" was born.

This is an ongoing project, just for fun.  Will periodically upload new versions with more levels, bug fixes, etc.  Basically, as I learn how to do things better, the game will expand and improve. Maybe one day it will become a publishable game, but for now it is just a hobby project.

Constructive feedback appreciated! 

NOTE:
Current version supports xbox controller only.
